Title: Relates to the computation of building aid for the construction, reconstruction or modernizing of certain schools by the Binghamton City School District
Summary: Relates to the computation of building aid for the construction, reconstruction or modernizing of certain schools by the Binghamton City School District.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the computation of building aid for construction, reconstruction or modernizing of projects for Binghamton City School District
